title: Global Network Analytics Market to Grow at 27.69% CAGR By 2019
text:
The report titled Network Analytics Market – Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, segmentation by regions, deployment, end users and industry verticals. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
The report brings about a detailed description of the developed regions (like North America) and emerging markets (like Asia) globally, service provider analysis (ResearchFox LAYERS), market forces, metrics and market share for the Network Analytics market.
Network Analytics Market Overview
Network analytics tools utilize analytics capabilities to monitor and forecast network performance on a real-time basis, helps IT admins to plan and manage network capacity thereby excelling in service delivery to customers. Network analytics technology performs advanced traffic forecasting which includes data load forecasting, device performance, application performance and user behavior. Network analytics has been gaining popularity as a solution to optimize network performance and achieve operational efficiency for companies.
Cloud adoption to drive Network Analytics market
Digitization is happening at a rapid pace across industry verticals with the emergence of advanced technologies forming the foundation for the digital strategies. The demand for upgraded network infrastructure, that offers communication services without any glitch, has become high more than ever. Network analytics has been gaining popularity as a solution to optimize network performance and achieve operational efficiency for companies.
Network analytics tools that utilize analytics capabilities to monitor and forecast network traffic on a real-time basis, helps IT admins to plan and manage network capacity thereby excelling in service delivery to customers. Emergence of cloud computing has helped small and mid-size companies to avail technology without investing heavily in IT infrastructure. The adoption of cloud based network analytics tools will enable companies to get visibility into real time data regarding network traffic and distribute bandwidth across their technology oriented business process according to priority.
North America being home to a number of leaders in the networking industry has been the strongest market for Network Analytics. The continuous rise in demand for networks at higher speeds in North America is resulting in a very good growth of this technology. While enterprises are also looking out for efficient network analytics solutions, mid-sized firms are slowly making their move into this segment. Apart from this, the demand for customized network solutions in the region is encouraging CSPs to deploy network analytics solutions.
The growing market for cloud computing in Europe has led the industry to adopt cloud solutions to scale technology oriented services at lower costs. Telecom players in Europe are witnessing decline in revenues because of the costly services. Customers at this point will look at services that will serve their customized requirements. Network analytics will help the telecom industry in planning customized services thereby retaining their customers.
APAC provides opportunity for telecom players to serve the largest addressable market. The growing broadband penetration has increased the number of mobile network users in the region. This is augmented by the availability of smartphones from a number of vendors at cheaper costs. Network Analytics helps telecom players in the region to meet the varied demands of customers.
Rest of the World comprising of regions like South America, Africa, Middle East etc. are witnessing cloud adoption encouraged by Governments. The growth of network analytics in the RoW region will be driven by the growth of associated business segments like IT infrastructure providers, cloud service providers, data center companies and networking firms.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Global Network Analytics market is segmented by:
- Regions (North America, Europe, APAC, South America and RoW)
- End users (Enterprise, Mid-size, Small Business)
- Deployment (Cloud and On-Premise)
- Industry Verticals (IT & Telecommunication, Financial Services, Healthcare, Retail, Government and Ecommerce & Web)
Companies discussed in the Global Network Analytics market research report are JDSU, Juniper Networks, CISCO, Accenture, HP, Sandvine Corporation, Procera Networks, IBM, Calix, Empirix, Danaher Corporation, Italtel, VPIsystems, Allot Communication, Subex, Alcatel Lucent, TIBCO, WildPackets, Ascom Holding, Hitachi Data Systems Corp. etc.
